tool_description: Creates and organizes the initial case file structure with proper folders, naming conventions, and metadata for legal case management.

client_name.description: Full legal name of the client

case_title.description: Official title or name of the case

attorney_id.description: Unique identifier of the primary attorney

error_messages: Invalid client name: Provide a valid client name for file organization
Unknown case type: Use a recognized legal case type
Missing case title: Provide a descriptive title for the case
Invalid attorney ID: Provide a valid attorney identifier
Invalid jurisdiction: Use a valid legal jurisdiction
usage: Provide client name, case type, case title, attorney ID, and jurisdiction. The tool will create a structured case file with appropriate folders and metadata.

case_number.description: Unique case number assigned to the file

file_structure.description: List of folders and structure created

creation_timestamp.description: Timestamp when case file was created
